channel.title: Transfer of Learning on Human and Machine Learning in Cognitive Science
channel.description: Recent content in Transfer of Learning on Human and Machine Learning in Cognitive Science

item.title: Learning to Learn
item.description: One interesting development in my research interests is the unexpected focus on ’learning to learn’ that many of my recent papers and projects have been focused on. During my PhD, I had shyed away from the more complex topics in cognitive modeling, such as meta learning. This decision was in part motivated by my interests in understanding the most basic and fundamental aspects of human and machine learning. Another aspect of this decision was the increased difficulty and potential problems that are associated with designing more complex tasks.
